column1: On the Distortion Value of the Elections with Abstention
AAAI Technical Track: Game Theory and Economic Paradigms

column2: distortion is a measure of how good the winner is. It is proved that no deterministic voting mechanism can guarantee a distortion better than 3
column3: even for simple metrics such as a line. In this study
column4: we wish to answer the following question: how does the distortion value change if we allow less motivated agents to abstain from the election?
